display_long_description:
In Afterlife: Dead Zone, you play as a soldier trapped in the Dead Zones, isolated areas where help seems impossible. Humanity teeters on the brink of extinction: ancient alien civilizations have returned to assess our development and, deeming us a threat, unleash weapons of mass destruction that turn people into bloodthirsty monsters.

Explore dark, devastated post-apocalyptic environments where hordes of zombies and mutated creatures can appear around every corner. Your mission is simple but deadly: shoot and avoid dying. While your weapons have infinite ammo, the variety and ferocity of enemies will demand strategy and quick reflexes to survive.

Designed for Meta Quest, Afterlife: Dead Zone delivers an immersive experience where you can only move physically within your designated play area, plunging you into a dark, destructive, and oppressive world.
